meanings.definition: The physical structure of a person or animal
meanings.sent1: Our bodies need food and water to stay healthy.
meanings.sent2: The bodies of the animals in the zoo looked strong and beautiful.
meanings.sent3: The bodies of the teddy bears in the shop seemed to be having a party.
meanings.sent4: The bodies of the cars on the highway moved like a colorful river.
meanings.sent5: The bodies of the trees in the forest swayed gently in the breeze.

meanings.definition: A group of people or things
meanings.sent1: The search party found the lost hikers' bodies quickly.
meanings.sent2: The bodies of students in the classroom were eager to learn.
meanings.sent3: The bodies of books on the shelf seemed to be whispering to each other.
meanings.sent4: The bodies of clouds in the sky gathered for a spectacular sunset.
meanings.sent5: The bodies of ants worked together to carry the food back to their nest.

meanings.definition: The main part of a book or document
meanings.sent1: The bodies of the report contained all the important information.
meanings.sent2: In the bodies of the novel, the story's climax was revealed.
meanings.sent3: The bodies of the recipe book held the secret to the delicious cake.
meanings.sent4: The bodies of the contract outlined the terms of the agreement clearly.
meanings.sent5: The bodies of the map showed the different routes to reach the destination.
